comments.text: That's the most boopable blep I've ever seen! 😍👅 Yoshi, you're an icon!
Master of the blep! This just made my day. 😂 Keep 'em coming, Yoshi!
Oh, the infamous corgi blep! 🐶 Caught in the wild and in its full glory! Thanks for sharing, Yoshi.
Every time I see a corgi blep, I feel like the world becomes a brighter place. 🌞 Please give him an extra treat for this!
Elegance, charm, and a touch of silliness all in one blep! 🎩👅 Yoshi, you're pure joy in a fur coat.
